verbs.description: The lavish hotel where President Trump and Kim Jong - un [V: will] meet is surrounded by peacocks , golf resorts and a security zone that bars all trappings of protest .

[ARG1: The lavish hotel] [R-ARG1: where] [ARG0: President Trump and Kim Jong - un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] is surrounded by peacocks , golf resorts and a security zone that bars all trappings of protest .
The lavish hotel where President Trump and Kim Jong - un will meet [V: is] surrounded by peacocks , golf resorts and a security zone that bars all trappings of protest .
[ARG2: The lavish hotel where President Trump and Kim Jong - un will meet] is [V: surrounded] [ARG1: by peacocks , golf resorts and a security zone that bars all trappings of protest] .
The lavish hotel where President Trump and Kim Jong - un will meet is surrounded by peacocks , golf resorts and [ARG0: a security zone] [R-ARG0: that] [V: bars] [ARG1: all trappings of protest] .
